meaningMnemonic:
If you <kanji>manipulate</kanji> the things you <kanji>make</kanji>, you are in <vocabulary>operation</vocabulary> of said things.

This can not only refer to the operation of devices and machinery, but also the <vocabulary>manipulation</vocabulary> of various elements, such as markets, stock prices, and more, with the intention of furthering one's own interests.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
